events.title: InnovateNIT 2023
events.description: Our annual innovation summit bringing together industry leaders, investors, and student innovators. Participate in workshops, panel discussions, and startup pitches.

events.title: Startup Showcase - March
events.description: Monthly pitch sessions where student entrepreneurs present their startup ideas for feedback from industry mentors and potential investors.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - Web3
events.description: Weekly workshop on blockchain and Web3 technologies led by industry experts from Polygon and Ethereum Foundation.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - AI/ML
events.description: Weekly workshop focusing on practical applications of AI and Machine Learning, featuring hands-on sessions with TensorFlow and PyTorch.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - IoT Workshop
events.description: Weekly workshop on building Internet of Things projects using Arduino and Raspberry Pi. Participants will build a smart home monitoring system.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - Mobile App Development
events.description: Weekly workshop on cross-platform mobile app development with React Native and Flutter. Learn to build and deploy apps to both iOS and Android.

events.title: Hackathon Series - March Edition
events.description: 24-hour coding challenge focused on solving healthcare problems with technology. Teams will compete for prizes and mentorship opportunities.

events.title: Startup Showcase - April
events.description: Monthly pitch sessions where student entrepreneurs present their startup ideas for feedback from industry mentors and potential investors.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - Cloud Computing
events.description: Weekly workshop on cloud infrastructure using AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Learn to deploy scalable applications and manage resources effectively.

events.title: Hackathon Series - April Edition
events.description: 24-hour coding challenge focused on fintech innovation. Build the next generation of financial technology solutions with our industry partners.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - Cybersecurity
events.description: Weekly workshop on ethical hacking and cybersecurity best practices. Learn to identify vulnerabilities and protect digital assets.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - Data Science
events.description: Weekly workshop on data analysis and visualization using Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib. Learn to extract insights from complex datasets.

events.title: Tech Tuesdays - Game Development
events.description: Weekly workshop on game design and development with Unity. Create your own 2D platformer game by the end of the session.

events.title: Innovation Awards 2023
events.description: Annual celebration recognizing outstanding student innovations and providing grant funding for promising projects. Join us for an evening of inspiration and recognition.
